name: Ext_R5_Task_requestedPerformer
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Task.requestedPerformer for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Task.requestedPerformer from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Task|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The kind of participant or specific participant that should perform the task.
element.comment: `Task.requestedPerformer` has no related element in R4B:Task `Task.requestedPerformer` has no related element in R4B:Task `Task.requestedPerformer` has no related element in R4B:Task `Task.requestedPerformer` has no related element in R4B:Task

binding.description: The type(s) of task performers allowed.
